channel.title: Worked Example :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Let’s go through another worked example to see how we can translate a problem statement into a working program. We’ll also take a look at how we can test the program to verify that it is working as intended. Problem Statement Here’s a short and simple game that can be played by three players: Three players each guess a positive integer greater than $ 0 $, and then share them simultaneously.
